title: Industrial Mysore. Series 1
creator_credit: Jagat Murari, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: Mysore is one of the most highly industrialised states in India. Works include the Mysore Iron and Steel Works; the Krishnasagar Dam, where the river Kaveri has been harnessed; Sivasamundrum and Jog Falls; the state-owned porcelain works and power generating station; the aircraft industry and a factory for manufacturing telephones and electronic equipment.
creator_credit_for_label: Jagat Murari, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
